spoiler.name: Panel number
spoiler.desc: Enter a number of your panel and their data, then click Apply button to generate them

cover.name: Corver
cover.desc: Choose images source. You can use images from Media library.

number.desc: Item number show (per row - Grid display / visible - Carousel display)

icon_show.name: Show icon
icon_show.desc: Set icon show/hide or before/after text

shortcode.name: ICON_BOX

icon.name: Number of icon
icon.desc: Enter a number of your icon and their data, then click Apply button to generate them

dark.name: Dark style

number.desc: Item number show (per row - Grid display / visible - Carousel display)

user.name: Testimonial number

shortcode.name: SKILLBARS

show_striped.name: Striped
show_striped.desc: Striped effect. Not available in IE9 and below.

skillbar.desc: Enter a number of your skillbar and their data, then click Apply button to generate them

counter.name: Counter number
counter.desc: Enter a number of your progress and their data, then click Apply button to generate them
